tip.cred1: Enter your KlickTipp username and password to log in. Ensure that your credentials are valid to generate session data required for API calls.
tip.cred2: Sign up for a KlickTipp account at KlickTipp.
tip.cred3: This node will authenticate with KlickTipp and return session credentials used for further API interactions.
tip.cred4: Copy and store your session ID and session name for reuse across subsequent nodes. Ensure the session is still valid before making further requests.
tip.cred5: You can use the session data to make requests without logging in every time, until the session expires.
tip.sharedLink: This node communicates with KlickTipp API and can manage subscribers, tags, and more.

info.login-success: Successfully logged into KlickTipp and obtained session data.
info.logout-success: Successfully logged out of KlickTipp and session terminated.
info.shared-link-generated: The shared link for the uploaded file has been successfully generated.

warn.missing-session: Missing KlickTipp session data. Please log in.

error.auth-url-failed: Failed to determine redirect auth URL
